description: Borrowed from Ancient Greek παιδεραστία (paiderastía, “love of boys”), from παιδεραστής (paiderastḗs, “pederast”), from παῖς (paîs, “child, son, boy”) + ἐραστής (erastḗs, “lover”), from ἔραμαι (éramai, “to love”).

entries.meaning: Erotic love, sexually expressed or chaste, between a man and an adolescent boy.
examples: Antonym: (erotic love between a woman and a girl) korephilia

entries.meaning: (archaic) Anal intercourse in general, usually between a man and an adolescent boy.
